definition: to offer/to present/to dedicate/to donate/to show/to put on display/worthy person (old)

sentences.english: The team of contributors is generally responsible for the project area and everything in it.
sentences.chinese: 贡献者组成的团队一般负责该项目区域和其中的一切。

sentences.english: China may soon make a big contribution to the bank's intellectual ranks.
sentences.chinese: 中国可能很快就会为世行的学者队伍作一个大贡献。

sentences.english: The second chapter makes contribution in chemical fiber for Qian Baojun science and technology.
sentences.chinese: 第二章为钱宝钧在化学纤维研究方面的贡献。

sentences.english: He is determined to devote his life to sicence.
sentences.chinese: 他决心把毕生精力贡献给科学事业。

sentences.english: Everyone should make a contribution to protecting the environment.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都应当为保护环境做贡献。

sentences.english: People contribute to free software in many ways.
sentences.chinese: 人们用多种方式为自由软件做贡献。

sentences.english: This is a dream right Liezi a significant contribution to science.
sentences.chinese: 这是列子对梦学的重大贡献。

sentences.english: His greatest contributions came when he was a "senior citizen."
sentences.chinese: 他作出最大了贡献的时候已是垂暮之年了。

sentences.english: Feminine cinema aesthetics is undoubtedly a great contribution to the cinematographic art of this century.
sentences.chinese: 女性电影美学无疑是对百年的电影艺术的一大贡献。

sentences.english: The results from the magnetoresistance measurements allow to determine the weak localization contribution to the temperature dependence of the resistivity.
sentences.chinese: 由测量结果可确定弱定域化对电阻温度关系的贡献。

sentences.english: The third chapter is the historical contribution and impact of Lu Cheng's aesthetic thinking.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，吕澄美学思想的历史贡献及影响。

sentences.english: Most of modern economic growth theories neglect the contribution of land element.
sentences.chinese: 现阶段土地要素对我国经济增长贡献显著。

sentences.english: Since then, we've had individual contributors provide translations for their own languages.
sentences.chinese: 此外，我们还有个人贡献者提供自己语言的翻译。

sentences.english: They grow fast and make great contributions to the social development.
sentences.chinese: 它成长速度快，为社会的发展做出了巨大贡献。

sentences.english: Oxen have made great contributions to the world.
sentences.chinese: 这牛对世界的贡献实在是太大了。

definition: to offer respectfully/to consecrate/to dedicate/to devote
accomplishment/success/achievement/CL:個|个[ge4]/to achieve (a result)/to create/to bring about
to display/to exhibit/to bring out implicit or innate qualities/to express (a thought or moral)/to develop (an idea)/to elaborate (on a theme)
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
to show/to show off/to display/to manifest/expression/manifestation/show/display/performance (at work etc)/behavior
